Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the tweet was not actually made by Biplab Deb but by a parody handle.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by not verifying the source and authenticity of the tweet before reporting it as true.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the media outlets and individuals who reported the tweet may have been unaware that it came from a parody handle and believed it to be true.

Understate: There is no evidence of understating biases in the claim.
